gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharing` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharing` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityAdditions` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_EquityAdditions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_EquityAdditions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAdditionsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAdditionsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAdditionsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAdditionsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityWithdrawals` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EquityWithdrawals')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EquityWithdrawals return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEquityWithdrawalsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEquityWithdrawalsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEquityWithdrawalsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEquityWithdrawalsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReserveDiscretionaryProfitSharingMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
